name: Wizard's Harmony 2
overview: Wizard's Harmony told the story of the Wizard Rufus that after causing a scandal at the wizards academy and destroy the magical power of Dale, he is punished and begins the game having to recruit in his first week at the academy other 5 apprentices and after that they will have to train during a 3 years time to improve their stats at the wizards academy. In Wizard's Harmony 2 the player takes the role of a new wizard (called Scion Schelnarg), you're the master of the Magic Club but outside forces unravel your little academy of acolytes. Together, you and your friends rebuild the Magic Club by interaction, good schooling and a touch of the mystical arts. The player can choose what their characters do each week, they can study, train different magic styles, be a better listener, rest, etc. Depending of the training the affinity of the members will be worse or better. In the weekends Scion can go around different places of the academy or the town and maybe he can meet and talk to different people. Depending of their skills the students will go up a grade, the grades are: Grade 1 = 1st, grade 2 = 2nd, 3 = 3rd grade
